FM Meets New Malian Ambassador
articles.content:
FM Meets New Malian Ambassador 
   Pyongyang, November 8 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, DPRK foreign minister, met and conversed with Ntji Laico Traore, new Malian ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him on Thursday.

articles.title: Day of UN Observed
Delegation of Regional Administration of Russia Here
articles.content:
Delegation of Regional Administration of Russia Here 
   Pyongyang, November 8 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Sakhalin Regional Administration of Russia led by Melnikov Valentin, vice-chairman of the Sakhalin Regional Committee for International, Overseas Economic and Inter-Regional Relations, arrived here on Thursday.
